name: Instyle Perfect Coverage Foundation - N 5 | 12-Hour Flawless Wear | Top 5 Benefits
description:
Instyle Perfect Coverage Foundation - N 5: Your Ultimate Complexion Perfector

Instyle Perfect Coverage Foundation - N 5 delivers flawless coverage with a natural finish that lasts all day. This premium foundation is specially formulated to provide buildable coverage while feeling lightweight on the skin. 💫

The N 5 shade is perfectly balanced for medium skin tones with neutral undertones, making it an ideal match for a wide range of complexions. Whether you're heading to the office or preparing for a special event, this foundation creates a smooth, even canvas that looks natural in any lighting.

Why Choose Instyle Perfect Coverage Foundation?

The Instyle Perfect Coverage Foundation - N 5 stands out from other foundations thanks to its unique formula that combines coverage with skincare benefits. Enriched with hydrating ingredients, this foundation not only conceals imperfections but also nourishes your skin throughout the day. 🌟

Unlike many heavy foundations, this formula won't settle into fine lines or wrinkles. Instead, it moves with your skin for a comfortable wear experience that lasts up to 12 hours without the need for touch-ups.

Product Information

Size 30ml / 1.0 fl oz
Gender Unisex
Product Type Liquid Foundation
Finish Natural Matte
Brand Name Instyle

Key Features of Instyle Perfect Coverage Foundation

  • Medium to full buildable coverage
  • Oil-free formula suitable for all skin types
  • Enriched with vitamin E and hyaluronic acid
  • SPF 15 for daily sun protection
  • Transfer-resistant and long-wearing
  • Dermatologically tested and non-comedogenic

The Instyle Perfect Coverage Foundation was developed after extensive research to create a formula that provides professional-level coverage while maintaining a skin-like appearance. The brand's commitment to quality is evident in every application. 🔍

Frequently Asked Question

How do I know if Instyle Perfect Coverage Foundation - N 5 is the right shade for me?

The N 5 shade is designed for medium skin tones with neutral undertones. If your skin has neither pink (cool) nor yellow (warm) undertones, and falls in the medium range, this shade will likely be a perfect match. For best results, test the foundation along your jawline and check the color match in natural daylight. The foundation should blend seamlessly with your skin tone without appearing too pink, yellow, or ashy.

Complete your makeup collection with our Instyle Precision Concealer, Instyle Setting Powder, and Instyle Makeup Primer for a flawless finish that lasts all day. ✨
short_description: Instyle Perfect Coverage Foundation - N 5 delivers flawless, buildable coverage for medium skin tones with neutral undertones. This lightweight, long-wearing formula creates a natural matte finish while nourishing skin with vitamin E and hyaluronic acid.
